15:00 <upgradingXwiki> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <upgradingXwiki> Hi guys, I'm trying to upgrade xwiki 3.3 to 7.3 (yep a huge step), I'm actually stuck at the following exception "com.xpn.xwiki.store.migration.DataMigrationException: Failed to check the current annotation and comments classes for customizations. Migration will not execute org.xwiki.annotation.io.internal.migration.hibernate.R40001XWIKI7540DataMigration.checkAnnotationsAndComments(R40001XWIKI7540DataMigration.java:153)" any  
15:03 <upgradingXwiki> xwiki 3.3 war -> 7.3 war, mysql DB and filesystem for attachments  
15:03 <vmassol> upgradingXwiki: wow indeed a huge step… might be better to try to migrate to intermediate versions  
15:03 <vmassol> can't help you much on my side sorry  
15:04 <upgradingXwiki> thanks vmassol, I'll try to split the process in more upgrades, cheers ;)
